The Federal Election Commission: FEC) data shows that Kathy Manning has outraised Ted Budd by almost $800,000 in their congressional race in North Carolina's 13th district.
U: S. Rep. Ted Budd claimed on social media that most of Kathy Manning's donors live outside of North Carolina.
An Axios article cited by Budd states th: 5 percent of Manning's campaign donors are from outside of North Carolina, while 28 percent of Budd's donors also live outside of the state.
The dataset from the FEC and Open Secret: a nonpartisan organization, indicates that only 45 percent of Manning's donors are in North Carolina.
